title: Shawl, 20th century
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 211 x 210 cm (6 ft. 11 1/16 in. x 6 ft. 10 11/16 in.)
description: Large square shawl of white silk fringed on all sides with white silk. Embroidered around border and in four corners with white silk thread in realistic floral design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: silk
Technique: embroidered. Gift of Mrs. Charles Hendricks. 1927-10-1.
